title: Glacier National Park: Park Statistics
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Management     Park Statistics              Park Statistics         A mother and her two children from California, recognized as representatives of Glacier's 100th million visitor, 2015 NPS/Jacob W. Frank  In June 2015, Glacier celebrated its 100 millionth visitor (in the form of a mother and children from California). Visitation has been on the rise in the last 5 years with more and more people flocking to the park to enjoy its scenic splendor and opportunities for recreation in the great outdoors. Ever wonder what the annual visitation is for Glacier? Find that and related data on the NPS Visitor Use Statistics page. Want more fun facts? Check the Glacier Fact Sheet for all sorts of numbers and statistics.
